channel.title: One error with client anyone is welcome to help (Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4)
channel.description: [code] Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8217 at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4.method385(class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4).java:152) at client.method18(client.java:144) at client.method102(client.java:7736) at client.method9(client.java8581) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4377) at java.lang.Thread.run(unknown Source) [/code] Thanks in advance for all the help

item.title: One error with client anyone is welcome to help (Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4)
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

ok off of the laughing mand thing i wanna know if anyone know what to do about this error

[quote=“FusionLord, post:1, topic:249791”] Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8217 at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4.method385(class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4).java:152) at client.method18(client.java:144) at client.method102(client.java:7736) at client.method9(client.java8581) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4377) at java.lang.Thread.run(unknown Source)
Thanks in advance for all the help[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: One error with client anyone is welcome to help (Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4)
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:5, topic:249791”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=329297.msg2574636#msg2574636 date=1228876095]
Should be posted in the Client Questions Section.

Would help, but i don’t know much about clients atm.
[/quote]
This is not a question regarding the official Moparscape client and therefore does not belong in that section.

I think I understand what he’s doing.
He’s typing something that’s too long and causing the client to crash.[/quote]Oh, well he didn’t really explain, and again, i don’t know much about clients ;]

But yeah, it’s probably his name. I was on Soul’s server when laughing man came on. His name is extremely long, along with everything else he says.

Read full topic
